Description: Stand with feet shoulder-width, toes slightly out. Hinge at hips, grab kettlebell, swing to shoulder height, return.
Hold kettlebell at chest, feet shoulder-width. Squat down, return to start.
Staggered stance, one foot forward. Bend at hips, row kettlebell to side, return.
Kettlebell between feet. Bend at hips and knees, lift kettlebell, return.
Lie back, arm holding kettlebell up. Roll onto elbow, stand up, reverse.
Feet shoulder-width, kettlebell overhead. Bend at hips, lower torso, return.
Sit, feet off ground, twist torso with kettlebell, side to side.
Hold kettlebell at chest, circle around head, reverse.
Lift kettlebell, rotate hand, press overhead, return.
Hold kettlebell at chest, step into lunge, return.
Kettlebell between feet. Bend, pull up to shoulder, return.
Plank position, drag kettlebell under torso, side to side.
